meanings.definition: To remove dead skin cells from the surface of the skin.
meanings.sent1: I exfoliate my skin to make it smoother.
meanings.sent2: She exfoliates her face every week to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent3: After I exfoliate, my skin feels refreshed and clean.
meanings.sent4: Exfoliating is like giving your skin a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: Exfoliating helps to reveal a brighter complexion.

meanings.definition: To shed or peel off in thin layers.
meanings.sent1: The snake will exfoliate its old skin soon.
meanings.sent2: The tree bark exfoliates naturally as it grows.
meanings.sent3: Watching paint exfoliate off a wall can be oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The memories slowly exfoliate from my mind like old paint.
meanings.sent5: The glacier exfoliates, revealing its icy layers.
